Translations.Text: fa-is'tajaba lahum rabbuhum anni la udiʿu ʿamala ʿamilin minkum min dhakarin aw untha baʿdukum min baʿdin fa-alladhina hajaru wa-ukh'riju min diyarihim waudhu fi sabili waqatalu waqutilu la-ukaffiranna ʿanhum sayyiatihim wala-ud'khilannahum jannatin tajri min tahtiha l-anharu thawaban min ʿindi l-lahi wal-lahu ʿindahu hus'nu l-thawabi
la yaghurrannaka taqallubu alladhina kafaru fi l-biladi
mataʿun qalilun thumma mawahum jahannamu wabi'sa l-mihadu
lakini alladhina ittaqaw rabbahum lahum jannatun tajri min tahtiha l-anharu khalidina fiha nuzulan min ʿindi l-lahi wama ʿinda l-lahi khayrun lil'abrari

wa-inna min ahli l-kitabi laman yu'minu bil-lahi wama unzila ilaykum wama unzila ilayhim khashiʿina lillahi la yashtaruna biayati l-lahi thamanan qalilan ulaika lahum ajruhum ʿinda rabbihim inna l-laha sariʿu l-hisabi
yaayyuha alladhina amanu is'biru wasabiru warabitu wa-ittaqu l-laha laʿallakum tuf'lihuna
